pullRequest.title: [netatmo] Support for favorite weather stations (#8020 #8111)
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull-request enables users to include weather data of favorite weather stations.
See issues #8020 and #8111 for more information.

[8111] Added support for favorite weather stations

Signed-off-by: Sven Strohschein <sven.strohschein@gmail.com>

French localization added for the new includeFavoriteStations parameter

Signed-off-by: Sven Strohschein <sven.strohschein@gmail.com>

Naming of weather stations and modules precised (to differ from favorite stations and to make clear which modules belong to which station)

nodes.bodyText:
Please apply the formatting standards set for the project. This is something to setup in your IDE. Additionally you may have a command to reformat a source file but I don't know it.
As an example, there is a space between the if and its condition.
I think the core framework already provides a method for that. I have to search.

commit.message:
Code format applied

Signed-off-by: Sven Strohschein <sven.strohschein@gmail.com>

Code format applied

Typo fixed

Signed-off-by: Sven Strohschein <sven.strohschein@gmail.com>
